structure.unit: Executive And Administrative Officers Of The Commonwealth
Climate Protection And Green Economy Act

law.catch_line: Promulgation Of Regulations That Reduce Energy Use, Increase Efficiency And Encourage Renewable Sources Of Energy
law.text: In implementing its plan for statewide greenhouse gas emissions limits, the commonwealth and its agencies shall promulgate regulations that reduce energy use, increase efficiency and encourage renewable sources of energy in the sectors of energy generation, buildings and transportation.
